dao

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDBDAO

    public interface CustomerDAO
    this is a interface to configure all the functions and operations that customer needs
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    monder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCouponToCustomer(int customerId, int couponId)
      insert couponId and customerId to database , connecting customer and coupon
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Receives a customer instance and register it in the database
      java.util.Collection<Customer> getAllCustomer()
      returns an ArrayList of all the customers in the database
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()
      returns an ArrayList of all the coupons purchased by the current customer from the database
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByCustomerId(long id)
      returns an ArrayList of all the coupons purchased by the current customer from the database for specific customer by id
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByPrice(double price)
      returns an ArrayList of all the coupons purchased by the current customer from the database by price
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType couponType)
      returns an ArrayList of all the coupons purchased by the current customer from the database by type
      Customer getCustomer(long id)
      Receives an id of a customer and returns an instance of the desired customer from the database

      inserting customer to database
      boolean isCustomerExist(Customer customer, java.sql.Connection tempConn)
      checks the customer exist in the database
      boolean isFirstBuy(Coupon coupon, java.sql.Connection tempConn)
      checking if the customer has not purchased the coupon before
      boolean isValidAmount(Coupon coupon, java.sql.Connection tempConn)
      checking if coupon have amount bigger than 0
      boolean isValidDate(Coupon coupon, java.sql.Connection tempConn)
      checking if coupon is not out of date
      boolean login(java.lang.String custName, java.lang.String password)
      checks the database for a customer with the given name and the given password
      void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      connecting coupon to customer
      void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Receives a customer instance and removes it's entries from the database
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Receives a customer instance and update its entries in the database

      • createCustomer

        void createCustomer(Customer customer)
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException,
                    java.sql.SQLException,
                    DuplicateEntryException,
                    NullConnectionException
        Receives a customer instance and register it in the database
        Parameters:
        customer - a customer instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - thrown when the customer class is not available
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown when the thread is interrupted - might be because the system is shutting down
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown when the sql query is wrong
        DuplicateEntryException - thrown when trying to register a customer that already exist
        NullConnectionException - thrown when the connection is null

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String custName,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws java.sql.SQLException,
              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
              java.lang.InterruptedException,
              WrongDataInputException,
              NullConnectionException
        checks the database for a customer with the given name and the given password
        Parameters:
        custName - the customer's name
        password - the customer's password
        Returns:
        true value if there is a match' false if there is no match
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - thrown when the customer class is not available
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown when the thread is interrupted - might be because the system is shutting down
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown when the sql query is wrong
        WrongDataInputException - thrown when the input does not match any customer in the database
        NullConnectionException - thrown when the connection is null
